section.title: Description
section.p: Identifies the Person who picked up (i.e., took custody of) the dispensed medication, if that person is someone other than the patient.

stentry.p: A unique identifier for the person who picked up the dispensed medication, typically a drivers license number.
Indicates how the Person who picked up the medication is related to the intended recipient (i.e., the patient).
Pointer to the Person who is playing the Role of DispenseRecipient
